nodes.text: Surik Varr was a male Arcona member of the Republic Strategic Information Service during the Cold War.

In 3643 BBY, he was stationed on the planet Alderaan where he pretended to be a merchant in the House Traders' Circle in King's Pass. He informed a Republic citizen that House Rist assassins under Thorin Rist - also posing as merchants - plotted to assassinate a group of House Organa nobles.
